name: Secret Salons
overview:
Secret Salons is a premium UK beauty salon directory, with listings for over 50,000 beauty salons and spas across the country.

Formed in May 2010, the site has grown to host over 150,000 visitors every month, with the audience being primarily, though not exclusively, female between 19 and 50.

Secret Salons provides a valuable service to customers by allowing them to search for their favoured treatment in a specified locations, providing relevant and useful results to help them make an informed choice. This means if a user searches for “massage in Covent Garden”, a list of relevant and rated salons will be displayed in the listings.

The new gift experience area also provides a number of gifts and days out for families, couples and individuals alike. For celebrity-followers there are also a wealth of galleries and images to browse.

For advertisers, Secret Salons is free to list on but premium listings are also provided. With a premium listing, salons can gain a sponsored, stand-out listing in relevant search results. The site also offers a lead forwarding service for premium salons.
